title: My Husband is Weak by Day, Strong by Night
summary: Meredith is the illegitimate daughter of a duke. Scorned by her own family, she is shocked to hear that they have arranged a marriage for her—with no other than the Emperor of Valtzein. She soon learns that His Majesty has been placed under a curse and is weak during the day, returning to his former self only at night. When he tries to kill her on their wedding night, she strikes a deal with him—she will find a way to use her healing magic to break him free from the curse, in return for a divorce. But the Emperor has other thoughts—he's slowly fallen in love with her, and he won't let her go without a fight.

title: The Villain of the Octagon
summary:
The beloved third son of a ducal house aims to escape his villainous fate!?
Back when I (age 6) was still a spoiled brat laughing arrogantly, I regained memories of my past life. This is an RPG world?! And worse, I’m destined to be crushed by the hero, labeled the weakest of the three brothers… aka the villain. Talk about bad luck. This sucks.  

After panicking, moping, and overthinking, I made a decision: First, quit being a villain! I’ll become a good boy, get along with my beloved older brothers and the servants, and dodge every death flag!!

title: The Substitute Saintess is Doted on by the Enemy Crown Prince’s Kiss
How to Survive as the Daughter of the Emperor Who Killed Me
A Stepmother’s Märchen
summary:
They called her the Iron Widow. 

When her husband died, he left her to manage not only his vast holdings but also his four children. Young and inexperienced, Shuri nonetheless tried her best to raise them, despite their bitter attitude towards her. She is finally free to live her own life as her eldest son marries… only to find herself mysteriously reset to seven years ago — the night of her husband's funeral. 

Can Shuri find happiness with this second chance at a new destiny?

title: Surviving as a PD Idol
summary:
A notorious PD, despised by everyone, becomes an unknown idol in a parallel world.
Only his younger sibling remembers him fully.
To return to his original world, he must become a top idol and clear the game!

"...Quest accepted."
"Are you crazy?"
"Gotta eat to live, don't I?"

His specialty is intimidation, his hobby is persuasion.
The idol survival story of a ruthless PD who stops at nothing!

title: I Got A Job At A Haunted Mansion
The Guidebook for Villainesses
summary:
Laviore Bailey — the ‘fake saintess’ who banished the innocent princess and stirred up bad blood to wage war.

She’s the villainess with a façade of a saintess.

“I love you. So just shut your mouth and die. Okay?”

But the moment her trusted lover chose her as a sacrifice to the demon, and she realized her father was behind the plan, she killed herself by swallowing poison. It hurt. It was so painful that she could not even scream. But it was fine. Because she knew this was not the end.

“I will save you this time.”

Then, she came back for her second life. She was determined to rescue those who were unlucky because of her and restored her life back.

“You do whatever you want for the man in your dream.” Demian said with a rough smile. 

“I’ll also protect you the way I want to.”

---
Laviore Rea Bailey, the fake saint and heartless puppet of the merciless Prince Sidar, drinks poison on the day the prince is to give her up as an offering to the devil. Instead of dying, she wakes up 10 years in the past. Set on righting her previous wrongs, Laviore vows to save the slave Damian Rhode Drake, whom she had once framed as a spy. As she gets closer to the mysterious Damian, new feelings start to emerge, but will this former villainess truly be able to change her ways?

title: Code Demon
summary:
Reincarnated into the Demon King's castle!? Magic developed using programming skills! And even the Demon Kings recognize that magic——?
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/68401)

title: I Was Reincarnated as the Spoiled Baby Empress
Food Chain
summary:
I, Go Eun-woo, have lived while hiding my status among humans. I used my abilities to reduce the pain of scarlet fever, the fate of the Tiger tribe, which I have suffered from since I was 18, but was discovered by the Tiger's natural enemy, Imae.
“Don’t be so foolish. If you run away, you’ll die by my hands in a month or so.”
Moreover, this cold and frighteningly handsome Lee Mae,
I can’t believe I have the same seal as Lee Do-hoon. I bought time by lying, but it's only a matter of time before I get caught. I have to escape from his grasp somehow... !
“Please stay in my room with me for the time being.”
Can I go back to my normal daily life?!

title: Pure Love Operation
summary: It’s hard dating someone who won’t give you the time of day. Su-ae Shim knows that better than anyone, having dated her indifferent boyfriend, Minu Kang, for years. She sometimes wishes she could be more like her charismatic stepsister, Ra-im, who seems to have it all. But life takes a turn for the weird when Su-ae discovers Jellypop, a sentient flip phone, in her locker. Jellypop has a lot to say about her love life, especially as Su-ae drifts further away from Minu and finds herself running into Minu’s friend, Eunhyeok. Add to the mix a growing suspicion that Minu and Ra-im might be more than friends, and Su-ae might need a miracle to navigate the ups and downs of high school romance!

title: North Snow Love Story
summary:
A collection of stories full of happiness for those who like happiness. Gags also included.

1. A Story about a Stalker in High School

2. Longing for Sleeves.
After dealing with childhood trauma, Rin keeps lying to herself about her love about Lolita fashion until one day she is confronted by a classmate, someone she didn't expect.
A story about two opposite people being united by a common passion in life.

3. The Suffering of the Mermaid Princess
An enslaved mermaid meets a human king.

4. Snow White Falls in Love with the Hunter

5. The Witch of the House of Sweets

title: On a Separate Night
summary:
"From now on, is it okay for me to have an ‘adult relationship’ with you, Young Lady?"

Yui Amagi is the daughter of a yakuza family who longs for a "normal life." Her dream of living on her own finally comes true… or so she thought. But her assigned bodyguard—who also happens to be her fiancé—Ichika Izumo, the Wakagashira (Underboss) of the Amagi group, insists that "it’s only natural for me to be here," while smoking a cigarette as if he owns the place.

Yui doesn’t actually dislike Ichika (in fact, she secretly likes him), but she doesn’t want a romance arranged by her parents. Without realizing her own feelings, she decides to spite him by joining a group blind date.

However, once the party starts, she feels completely out of place and ends up depressed. To make matters worse, one of the men there takes advantage of her vulnerability and tries to take her to a hotel…!?

"You dare join a group date when you already have me, your fiancé?"

An impatient yandere Underboss × a stubborn young lady, caught in an overly intense and sweet “awakening cohabitation love story”… ♪

title: Standard of Reincarnation
summary:
Despite having only one arm, Daven had finally proven his worth after defeating his cousin Kazin in honorable combat. But Kazin took advantage of Daven’s mercy, stabbing him in the back and imprisoning him for life.

500 years later, the minor god Yulian is reborn and unknowingly summons Daven’s soul into the body of a young boy named Vincent Adenka.

As the pair work to reveal the truth of Daven and Kazin, Vincent must relearn the art of combat while Yulian discovers the art of reincarnation.

title: Helmut: The Forsaken Child
summary:
Helmut was a child who had been abandoned in the Demonic Beast Forest at birth.
Raised by Demonic Beasts, the first human that he met was the Sword Saint Darien.
Little did Helmut know that the chance encounter would soon shake the foundation of his fate…

“Grow stronger If you want to get out of here.”

The boy who’d lived like a beast was thrown into the human world!
He possessed overwhelming swordsmanship, outstanding looks and sharp intelligence, but there was one thing he lacked: humanity.

I am no longer a prey. I am now a predator!

title: ??? Rank no Ura Soubi Musou
summary: What would you do if you suddenly regained memories of your past life and realized you were living in a world that was once a game you played? Jinfrey chooses to use his knowledge as an OG gamer and exploit the game’s secrets so he can become an unparalleled adventurer. But he’ll have to be careful because if he dies, it’s game over! Will he be able to find all of the hidden rank equipment, defeat the bosses, and give his family the life they deserve?

title: Level Up with Skills
summary:
“Maybe Inner Gods can never defeat Outer Gods…” so thought Yuwon Kim, a plucky, high-ranking warrior, after a bitter defeat.

But Yuwon is too tenacious to give up. His loss becomes the dawn of a new journey as a returnee. With renewed determination, Yuwon starts back from where he began, smashing monster after monster and relearning his skills before taking on the Tower once again.

But can he fight his way through the tutorials and level up once more, or will his conquest crumble before him?

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xhObyLPUq6w)

title: I’m Repaying The Kindness That Raised Me With Obsession
I’m a Fake Saintess but the Gods are Obsessed
summary:
I reincarnated into the body of a fake saintess who will die when the real saintess appears five years later. If I were to gather the monthly allowance given to the saintess I can at the very least buy a building! But while I was carefully setting up a plan to run away after playing the role of the saintess... 

"Choose me, or else..." 

"I prepared a prison just for you. My goddess—" 

"..." 

The male leads reacted differently than I expected. 

[The bored divine beings have started to gain interest after watching you.] 

I, Ariel, unexpectedly gained the interest of the gods. On top of that, the final boss who is planning on destroying the world isn't killing me, but helping me...? I have no interest in gaining the interest of the gods or destroying the world! So please just let me become a landlord like I wanted—!

title: I have Max level luck
summary: The main character "Ryuya"  is told that he has no skills and is abandoned by his friends. The only way for him to compete with those possessing skills is to raise his level. After five years of training in the forest, he has raised his level to 8 million. Due to his excessively high level, he is beyond the reach of skilled humans, demons, or even gods.

title: Goblins Night
summary:
“The complex of the boy, Choi Si-woo, is being overweight. Choi Si-woo runs and runs around his house until past midnight, and he encounters an old man on a walking trail. In the blink of an eye, the old man covers Choi Si-woo with the straw backpack he is carrying. Where Choi Si-woo had stumbled upon was an enormously wide ruined traditional Korean house (hanok).

At the edge of the spacious courtyard, surrounding him on the courtyard, there were numerous black shadows standing. To the bewildered Choi Si-woo, the old man speaks. Once every 666 years, a ceremony is held to select the king of Yokai and each Yokai in this world possesses one entry ticket for it. And Choi Si-woo is, in fact, a hybrid of a human and a goblin, inheriting the blood of an extinct goblin. Among the goblin folk, only Choi Si-woo possesses the entry ticket. As the sole survivor inheriting the blood of a goblin, the adventure of the half-monster boy, Choi Si-woo, begins.”

title: Murim Login
summary:
Large numbers of monsters come out the gate which is the boundary of the world. After many sacrifices, People won the fight against monsters through their awakening. Jin Taekyung is alive as an 'F class hunter' which is the lowest level. After Jin has a hard time, he gets an old capsule then he goes into the capsule that is the martial heroes' world. And the game system gives him special abilities, he starts growing up to become the best martial hero.  

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A1%9C%EA%B7%B8%EC%9D%B8-%EB%AC%B4%EB%A6%BC/2384)
---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/11042/)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/55123)

title: My Little Brother Is The Academy’s Hotshot
The False Saintess Overturns Her Fate
The Best Martial Arts Instructor In The World
summary: The Demonic Cult Leader, Seok Woncho, was a monster who even surpassed the Blood Cult Leader. Do you know who killed him? “Ha Mu-baek.” “But why are you bringing that up…?” “Because he’s coming to our Mengryong Academy as an instructor.” …Damn it. We’re screwed! Ha Mu-baek, the greatest martial artist who crushed both the Demonic Cult and the Blood Cult, is now assigned as an instructor at a martial arts training academy due to a political power struggle. Determined to live quietly while keeping his identity hidden, he soon finds himself solving the problems of cadets with heart-wrenching backstories, disciplining the trashy human scum at the academy, and inexplicably becoming busier by the day… Welcome! It’s your first time meeting a genius lunatic instructor, isn’t it?!

title: The Hunter Lives In A rented Apartment
summary: Ten years ago, on the day of the first Great Rift, Jiho lost her father, who was a brave firefighter. Ever since, she has dedicated himself to becoming a Hunter, training constantly for the Hunter Association Exam. One day, in the midst of her training, a sudden rift outbreak engulfs her—and Jiho's life turned upside down.

title: Part-Time Grim Reaper
summary: “I’m from the afterlife.” Lee Do-jin needs money—a lot of it—to cover his younger sibling’s medical bills. With nowhere else to turn, he calls the number on a strange, ominous business card he finds by chance. At the meeting point, he encounters a silver-haired woman shrouded in mystery— a grim reaper, known as a Chasa. She makes him an unbelievable offer: Work as a temp worker for the Underworld. His mission? To stop “Mokdugi,” predators that feast on souls tainted by sin, before they can drag the damned into chaos. Thrust into the supernatural world of death, debt, and spiritual battles, Do-jin must navigate his new double life— balancing his humanity with a job that demands he walk the line between life and death.

title: Tears on a Withered Flower
summary:
Na Hae-soo's life unravels when her husband betrays her with an affair, leaving her burdened with debt and losing their child. In a devastating blow, she witnesses him with a younger woman. Broken and despondent, Na Hae-soo feels her life crumbling around her. However, a mysterious young man unexpectedly enters her life, asking to be taught about adult love. His vulnerability and sincerity begin to stir emotions within Na Hae-soo, challenging her to reconsider her path forward.

---
Romance, flowers, and dates-- once upon a time, that was the perfect description of Haesu and Mincheol. Now, all Haesu has is the ashes of their marriage and a mountain of debt. But her world shatters completely when Mincheol cheats on her with a young coworker. Hurt and betrayed, Haesu finds herself drawn to Taeha, a young man who seems desperate for her affection… and may be hiding more than he shows.

title: Broadcast Genius Youngest Writer
summary: After losing both her job and her work due to the schemes of the PD she worked with, Yeonwoo learns the truth and faces death from a heart attack. She thought her life was ending there, but when she opens her eyes, she finds herself back to her youngest writer days 20 years ago. Can this second chance at life turn into a successful one unlike before? The story of Yeonwoo, the youngest writer in broadcasting with a career-oriented perspective, begins anew.

title: I’ll Change the Ending Through Home Education
God of the Apocalypse
summary: Zeus, supreme chairman of the Council of Valhalla, announces to the gods twelve of the thirteen fighters set to participate in Ragnarok--and is met with the dissenting voices of those who were not chosen. However, Zeus has foreseen this, and immediately declares the holding of another tournament to decide the final spot on the Ragnarok lineup, one which will break the taboo on gods fighting one another.

title: The Princess is Evil
summary: After he and his entire class died on a field trip, Odamori accepts a job offer from a mysterious man to be reincarnated. However, his new job turns out to be that of a Slavemancer, with the power to dominate the minds of others and turn them into his toys. Soon, however his evil actions lead to a Princess Knight (who turns out to be one of his previous, more popular classmates) being dispatched to apprehend him. But Odamori, of course, has something different planned for their reunion...!

title: Return of the Frozen Player
summary:
When Seo Junho and his companions sacrificed themselves to defeat the Frost Queen, they thought they were restoring peace to Earth. But after 25 years of being frozen solid, Junho thaws out only to find that nine more floors appeared in his absence, only one of which has been cleared!

As the only one who holds the key to clearing the next floor and defrosting his friends, Junho must step up once again. But has this hero been in hibernation too long to take on the world’s fearsome new foes?

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%96%BC%EC%96%B4%EB%B6%99%EC%9D%80-%ED%94%8C%EB%A0%88%EC%9D%B4%EC%96%B4%EC%9D%98-%EA%B7%80%ED%99%98/2463)
---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E9%97%87%E5%A4%9C%E8%8B%B1%E9%9B%84%E7%A0%B4%E5%86%B0%E8%80%8C%E5%87%BA/176)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.podoteng.com/)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/79447)

title: Regressed Genius Creates Mythic Items
summary:
With the death of Earth’s potential Constellation, the Crimson Eye is now bent on consuming the world. 

Simun Kim--an alchemist out of necessity, due to an inability to use magic--successfully transmuted the Philosopher’s Stone to stop this cosmic threat. But he still failed. As death closes in, the Philosopher’s Stone rewinds time, waking Simun in the past with one last chance to rewrite the end of the world.

title: Camellia
summary:
“Uh… What country is this?”

“Han? You don’t even know where this is?”

Dong-baek, an ordinary college student , was dropped into the Three Kingdoms era at a much younger age..!

“…I am originally a woman, but I do not want to live as a ‘woman’.”

In an environment where it is difficult for women to even survive, Dong-baek decides to disguise herself as a man, becomes the adopted son of the powerful man Jang Yang, and begins to gather talented people from the Three Kingdoms, eventually gaining the emperor’s favor…

“I, Dong-baek, will follow the emperor’s word, put peace in this chaotic world, and return.”

Her project to survive in the Three Kingdoms begins.

title: The Summer Swallowed by Darkness
summary:
After her grandmother’s passing, Na Suhyeon returns to her hometown, leaving behind her city life.

Drawn by an inexplicable force, she climbs Obong Mountain—a place her grandmother had strictly forbidden her from entering while alive.

Lost deep in the woods and facing a mysterious danger, Suhyeon is rescued by a man named Seo Munju, who appears unharmed even after being beheaded.

Munju claims that Suhyeon is the reincarnation of Gang Yuhwa, his former spiritual mother and a shaman, and that the strange occurrences began when she set foot on the mountain.

Though wary of Munju, Suhyeon witnesses the chaos caused by vengeful spirits empowered by stolen sacred relics once buried in Gang Yuhwa’s grave. Moved by a sense of responsibility, she decides to help recover the five relics.

Munju suspects that the evil spirit who once drove Gang Yuhwa to her death is now reacting to Suhyeon’s aura and desecrated her grave.

Now, Suhyeon and Munju set out to confront tormented spirits and reclaim the relics.

Can they exorcise the evil spirit and end Munju’s eternal curse?

title: The Emperor’s Sword
summary: Ten years after a cataclysm nearly destroyed all life on the planet, magic prodigy Lag Logline is entrusted with the title of "sage" and given the task of preventing the world's destruction one thousand years from now. However when he awakens from his time freezing spell the world he finds is nothing like he remembers. Upon meeting a swordswoman named Clau, Lag finds out that this world one thousand years in the future doesn't know what magic is. After having his own magic mistaken for swordsmanship, Lag enrolls in the Imperial Sword Academy in order to unravel the mysteries of the world around him and fulfill his promise to save humanity.

title: Invasion of the Myriad Races: Starting by Taming a Legendary Beast
summary: All races have invaded Earth. Su Bai’s pet turtle evolved into the Black Tortoise , and his cat into the White Tiger . The Vermilion Bird and Azure Dragon , ancient sacred beasts, soon followed. However, these divine beasts have enormous appetites, which led Su Bai to become a notorious businessman that gives everyone headaches.“Brother, this is Black Tortoise blood, only selling for a mere ten billion. Hey, why are you cursing at me just because you’re not buying?”“The champion of the Hundred Schools competition wins ten billion? Help me up, I can still fight!”“The main city of all races has countless riches? As a human, I must protect my Dragon Country. I will lead the charge!

title: The Lord of the Wheel of Destiny
summary:
A collection of short stories:  
  
1. Oral Cavity Infectious Syndrome  
On the surreal premise that women's mouths take the often weird shape of their partner's penis, Yoriko starts an investigation to discover with whom her boyfriend is cheating.  
  
2. Local Tourist Information  
A guide to an extraterritorial region of Japan.  
  
3. Back Streets in Front of the Station  
A girl goes crazy about reverse sides of different things, including streets, cars, and animals.  
  
4. Genesis  
Kago Shintarou's rendition of the Book of Genesis.  
  
5. Superglue  
What happens when you step on something so disgusting that you never want to uncover it?  
  
6. Akutagawa in Front of the Station  
A surreal homage to the writings of Ryunosuke Akutagawa.  
  
7. When All's Said and Done - also included in Hell Season  
A gruesome tale of hardened faeces, and a limbless girl.  
  
8. Multiplication  
Comic panels are multiplying and create opposing clans.  
  
9. Abstraction  
A two dimensional comic about young lovers turns 3D causing the characters' bodies to deform.  
  
10. Blow-Up  
What happens when every comic page features exponentionally more panels than the previous one?  
  
11. No Need for Caution  
The action of the comic happens outside of the panels–literally–in the white space.  
  
12. The Memories of Others  
Everyone's memories become visible via floating comic book panels.  
  
13. Lord of the Ring  
An incompetent sumo wrestler uses the powers of a forbidden pair of pants to overcome and shame his competition, until one day someone rises to attempt to crush him and take the pants for himself.  
  
14. Spinning Thoughts  
Wearing urinary calculi is the latest fashion trend.

title: Where the Heart Is
summary:
I was reincarnated as an extra, the non-existent childhood friend of the male lead, who dies early in the novel. I can’t even avoid the time limit dead flag. That’s why I was living like this…

 “Why aren’t you healthy?” 

“I’m healthy.”

 “Why are you sick again? Did I allow you to be sick?” 

The male lead became obsessed with my health. Oh, please, can someone get rid of this guy! — I was definitely reincarnated as an extra with no presence. But my new life is unfolding strangely. 

“Why are you doing this for me?”

 “Because I like you.” 

Suddenly the sunny male lead started sticking to me.. 

“Mom, do it for me.”

 “I’m a man.”

And a handsome guardian who became my mother (gender: male)…

 “Hello, daughter!” 

Even a dad who was supposed to die appeared before me… Also.. 

“From today on, I’m your dad.”

 A suspicious human was aiming to become my dad. Why did I put myself in this undeserved situation as an extra? Can I really become healthy?

title: I’m Actually a Cultivation Bigshot
summary: Li Nianfan transmigrated to an immortal cultivation world as a mortal. Knowing that he could never become a cultivator, he decided to live an ordinary life. But unbeknownst to him, his dog became a mighty Yaoguai king by watching him draw and write; the tree he planted in the backyard became the tree of the world by listening to tunes he played; a passerby he met, who gained enlightenment from the chitchat with him, became a Taoist sage and started a new era...

title: I Became the Husband of the Cult Leader of the Demonic Sect
summary:
One of the Six Divine Clans of the Heavenly Demon Sect, the great heir of the Majin Jin Clan, Jin Yeomyeong.
Grateful for being born with a golden spoon in my mouth, I just wanted to enjoy a sweet life...
But damn that Murim Alliance — they destroyed the Heavenly Demon Sect.

And in the final moments of my life, the cult leader Cheon Yura says to me:
“Would you seduce me?”

title: Mr Devourer, Please Act Like a Final Boss
summary:
The Primordial Core’s an unconquerable dungeon, the lair of the most powerful monster ever to exist, the Original Monster, the incarnation of evil — Swallow... who happens to be a lazy boss monster who just wants to sleep.

Taking care of this lazy bum is Renee, a homunculus maid whose obsession with Swallow knows no bounds. At this point, the only one keeping the dungeon running is Patrick, the last brain cell of the bunch — and he’s a skeleton!

Will Mr. Swallow get any rest amid all this chaos?

title: I’m Gonna Annihilate This Land
summary:
Kim Isaac, once the all-powerful Skeleton King, is now a baby in a onesie. 

Tricked by the gods and sealed away, he’s reincarnated into a family of saints at the heart of the Holy Empire. He can’t walk or talk, but he can plot. And with his loyal demon followers working from the shadows and a grudge deeper than the underworld itself, this baby isn’t here to be cute — he’s here for payback. 

The Holy Empire has no idea what's coming… and the gods are about to regret ever crossing the Skeleton King!

title: The Monster Duke Mistook Me for His Wife
summary: No summary available.

title: Another Typical Fantasy Romance
summary: After the gods dropped her in the world of her favorite fantasy romance novel, Lithera was quick to realize that happily-ever-afters were never easy to get. Given another shot at happiness, she is now determined to avoid the mistakes of her previous life, starting by meeting the sweet and caring Grand Duke she spent years exchanging letters with… Another typical female lead, with another typical Duke, promised to wed. Will this story go the typical path we all expect?

title: The Price Is Your Everything
summary: Transported back to her first academy days, Nerys Truydd revisits a life marred by betrayal and torment. Exploited and poisoned by her own family and husband, her demise was met with a vow to curse those who wronged her. Now granted a second chance, Nerys vows to rewrite her fate. As she navigates her past, memories of those who hurt her flood back. Determined and fueled by retribution, she seeks to reclaim all she lost. Can she overturn her tragic past and emerge victorious from the shadows of her betrayal?
